Abathur.name: Abathur
Abathur.title: Evolution Master
Abathur.searchText: Abathur Zerg Swarm HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2 SC slug
Abathur.description: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.
Abathur.infoText: Abathur, the Evolution Master of Kerrigan's Swarm, works ceaselessly to improve the zerg from the genetic level up. His hate for chaos and imperfection almost rivals his hatred of pronouns.
